H0.text: Which actor plays Cate Blanchett's father in the 2004 film "The Missing", a story set in 19th century New Mexico where the father works with estranged daughter Blanchett to get her kidnapped child back. Robert Duvall

H1.text: Which actor plays Cate Blanchett's father in the 2004 film "The Missing", a story set in 19th century New Mexico where the father works with estranged daughter Blanchett to get her kidnapped child back. Kevin Costner

H2.text: Which actor plays Cate Blanchett's father in the 2004 film "The Missing", a story set in 19th century New Mexico where the father works with estranged daughter Blanchett to get her kidnapped child back. Sam Elliott

H3.text: Which actor plays Cate Blanchett's father in the 2004 film "The Missing", a story set in 19th century New Mexico where the father works with estranged daughter Blanchett to get her kidnapped child back. TommyLeeJones
